org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller

Class SysAdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller.SysAdminController

  • @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_SYSADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
 @Controller
public class SysAdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all pages that are exclusive to a user with the role SystemAdministrator. This includes pages that allow to add sources to the Clipping Service. Methods in this class are only accessible by a user with role UserRole.SystemAdministrator as defined in UserRole.resolveAuthorities()
